title: Alex Jones Show - 2014 June 17 TU [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show 
Tuesday, 17 June 2014


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................
From the Infowars web site :: On this Tuesday, June 17 edition of The Alex Jones Show, Alex analyzes how the globalists orchestrate mass invasions to destroy countries by design. 

Al-Qaeda has taken control of territory just north of Baghdad, the capital of Iraq, and is inching closer to the city of over seven million people. 

Here in the U.S., Infowars reporters Jakari Jackson and Jon Bowne join the show live from McAllen, Texas near the border of Mexico to report the latest news from their investigation into the explosive flood of illegal immigrants deliberately arraigned by the Obama administration. Strangely enough, the Infowars crew on the scene in South Texas are evidently more suspicious to U.S. Customs and Border Patrol than the massive influx of illegal aliens being chauffeured by church groups to free lodging.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually
 essential to seek information from a variety of sources, 
 to listen to a spectrum of voices in order to better 
 understand the "big picture." A reliance solely upon
 mainstream corporate media for news and info is a 
 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
 
 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents. 

 Think for yourself!
 To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.
